Uses of Package
io.hekate.cluster

  • Packages that use io.hekate.cluster 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.cluster
    ClusterService API.
    io.hekate.cluster.event
    API for handling cluster events.
    io.hekate.cluster.health
    Cluster node failure detection API.
    io.hekate.cluster.split
    Cluster split-brain detection API.
    io.hekate.codec
    CodecService API.
    io.hekate.coordinate
    CoordinationService API.
    io.hekate.core
    « start hereMain entry point to Hekate API.
    io.hekate.core.service
    Services API.
    io.hekate.election
    ElectionService API.
    io.hekate.failover
    Failover API.
    io.hekate.lock
    LockService API.
    io.hekate.messaging
    MessagingService API.
    io.hekate.messaging.broadcast
    Broadcast API.
    io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance
    Load balancer API.
    io.hekate.messaging.unicast
    Unicast API.
    io.hekate.metrics.cluster
    ClusterMetricsService API.
    io.hekate.partition
    Partitions mapping API.
    io.hekate.rpc
    RpcService API.
  • Classes in io.hekate.cluster used by io.hekate.cluster 
    Class and Description
    ClusterAcceptor
    Cluster join acceptor.
    ClusterAddress
    Address of the ClusterNode.
    ClusterFilter
    Interface for filtering groups of cluster nodes.
    ClusterFilterSupport
    Base interface for types that support cluster topology filtering.
    ClusterHash
    Cryptographic hash of the ClusterTopology.
    ClusterNode
    Provides information about a single cluster node.
    ClusterNodeFilter
    Interface for cluster nodes filtering.
    ClusterNodeId
    Universally unique identifier of the ClusterNode.
    ClusterNodeIdSupport
    Marker interface for objects that have (or are) ClusterNodeId.
    ClusterNodeJmx
    Information about a ClusterNode that is exposed to JMX.
    ClusterNodeRuntime
    Information about the JVM process of the ClusterNode.
    ClusterService
    « start hereMain entry point to clustering API.
    ClusterServiceFactory
    Factory for ClusterService.
    ClusterTopology
    Immutable snapshot of the cluster topology.
    ClusterTopologySupport
    Marker interface for objects that have (or are) ClusterTopology.
    ClusterView
    Filtered view of ClusterService.
